Plot: Twins, Connor and Grace, find truth to Vampirate shanty their father sang to them before he died, after they are shipwrecked and separated. Connor, aboard a pirate ship, learns to swordfight. For Grace, aboard a ship of vampire pirates, danger is great. What will it take for them to find each other?
Characters: Conner Tempest, Grace Tempest, Cheng Li, Lorcan Furey, Sidorio, Jeb Stukeley, Bart Pearce
